page.title: 11EDUCATION -School Log Book 2
page.content:
{3rd May, 1985 The Bishop of Birkenhead and Canon White visited school to meet staff and children and to join us for lunch.
{22nd May, 1985 Dr.Leo Aylen,poet,visted school this morning for a workshop session.This proved to be an enjoyable and stimulating occasion for the children. Expenses for this visit were paid by the P.T.A.
{17th June, 1985 The seventeen children leaving Duddon for secondary education this summer began a five-day visit to the Menai Centre, Anglesey today. We joined about 120 children and 28 staff from the Tarporley High feeder schools.
